page.title: 09The Town Centre
page.content: The centre of Trowbridge is very busy,especially on Friday and Saturdays.People often collect money from there bank for their shopping.In addition to the supermarkets,there are many small shops and a market.There are fashion clothes shops for young people but not so much for older people.The library is pleasant and has a good selection.There is a record office where people can do research and a resources centre where teachers can borrow,books,records and visual aids.Every Friday the local newspaper ,THE WILTSHIRE TIMES is puplished.This has been in existence since 1855.It contains items of news from west Wiltshire ,reports on local events and sporting activities.It carries adverts for,property,motor vehiicls,and small personal items.
